name: Cauldy's Quest for the Christmas Cake
name_original: Cauldy's Quest for the Christmas Cake
description:
It's Christmas Eve in the town of Festa, and the residents are getting ready for the annual Festa Festival. There will be singing, dancing, and, of course, everyone's favourite- a big, mouth-watering slice of delicious Christmas Cake.

...but this year the cake seems to have mysteriously disappeared! Now we need another one baked up- pronto!

If only the town had an anthropomorphic cooking pot resident with a love of festivities and a can-do attitude...

Oh wait, we do! Cauldy!




Explore the town of Festa.
Meet the townsfolk.
Gather ingredients and cook up recipes.
Save Festa from the Christmas Cake conundrum!




Controls Arrow Keys Move Z Talk + Pick Up X Attack Enter Open Inventory






Cauldy's Quest was made in 7 days for Design Buddies Game Jam '21. A massive thank you to everyone who took the time to play!
